Name: Raven Feather
Description: An item Lucia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The feather of an unknown raven is placed within the pages of a journal gifted to you. The girl who has finished her last remarks of the day looks up, her hand reaching out for the flying bird in the sky unconsciously. She hopes that she can fly across the world with those she cares about like a real raven.

Name: Spare Key For Motorbike
Description: An item Alpha sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A well-kept, vintage-looking spare key for a motorbike. You can tell how much its original owner treasured it. The key seems to be a silent invitation, one in which she will respect your wish and wait for you to set out together.

Name: Palm Pistol
Description: An item Lee sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: An intricately designed palm pistol gifted by Lee. Modified from the discarded core of his old frame, the palm-sized revolver comes with a surprisingly long range and high firepower—it seems to be a gift that has been prepared in advance. Now, Lee finally has a chance to give it to you. His warm, metal heart will keep pounding in your hand.

Name: Invitation And Keys
Description: An item Chrome sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: An invitation to a dinner banquet and a set of keys for the old Smith estate. The rectangular key card can open the side door to the garden; The key card in the shape of Strike Hawk's logo can open the front door to the reception; And the chip inside the rook can open the door to Chrome's bedroom. You are free to stay wherever you want and use whichever key you want without worry—a sign of Chrome's absolute trust in you.

Name: Painting Of The Stars
Description: An item Noan sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A notebook you gave Noan in the past. As if to prove his determination, he has filled the book with black-and-white sketches. Apart from the sunflower he mentioned, you also find an empty corner of the library, a glass coated in condensation, and more daily snippets among the sketches. The starry sky he once abandoned is now covered in colors, resting quietly on the last page of the notebook.

Name: Photo Attachment_0810
Description: An item Liv sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A photo of Liv's lounge taken by a house assistant-bot. The modest, healthy queen of the night on her desk has yet to bloom. A piece of sticky note is attached to the most eye-catching area. On the note is a list of grocery items, the snacks she wanted to make, the food you love, Clothes and daily supplies you needed... Everything except for things she needed. It seems like she sent you the photo by mistake when she was making preparations.

Name: Pulao's Candy
Description: An item Pulao sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A candy figure Pulao made following a traditional recipe long lost. Apparently, the sugar syrup used to make the candy was infused with different herbs and Chinese medicine, giving it energy-recovering properties and all sorts of health benefits. Pulao was going to sell the candy, but she might have been too heavyhanded with the ingredients, and the sugar would not melt no matter what... Still, that means it can be in your possession forever and ever.

Name: Bloom Of An Eon
Description: An item Selena sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: On a journey without a destination, the girl has picked up a gem. Inside this crystal blue amber, a flower has been sealed for tens of millions of years, and its blossom will never wither in frozen time.

Name: Chac-Chac
Description: An item Sophia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A pair of Akdilek instruments gifted by Sophia. They make a pleasant sound when you shake them, providing the beat for music and dance. She never thought she would be dancing at a ball. Controlling her body's movement was much more difficult than controlling machines. Still, she found herself enjoying it somehow. The one thing she remembers the most about that moment was the rhythm her partner made with the maracas. She no longer has a chance to dance lately. She wants to keep this wonderful instrument at your place for now while she looks forward to dancing with her partner and the shakers once again in the future.

Name: Warrior's Greatsword
Description: An item Kamui sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A common weapon used in popular RPGs during the Golden Age. A replica like this has not been manufactured for a long time, so this is probably one of Kamui's prized processions. A line is engraved on the sword: "All in war with time". He has given you his sword, alongside his passion, courage, and faith unreservedly.

Name: Takeaway
Description: An item Camu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The standard lunchbox given out by Babylonia. After some modifications from Camu, the box looks distinctive and iconic, with its insulating alloy keeping the takeaway inside at the desired temperature. There are a few cheese hotteok in the first layer, and Camu's favorite nightmare-spicy golden egg fried rice is in the second. It does seem to be a dinner he originally prepared for himself. But if that was the case, why is the food not double-spicy the way Camu likes?

Name: Moon Rock
Description: An item Luna sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: An unpolished rock the size of a palm. Based on Luna's letter, this rock comes from the surface of the Moon. It was delivered among other packages for Babylonia, so it was thoroughly inspected, and no sign of the Punishing Virus was detected. Supposedly, some stones would glisten like the Moon in the past, earning them the name "moonstone." Meanwhile, this rock only glows ever so slightly, but its light is significantly warmer than the moonlight. Two Moons converged—and this is who she is now.

Name: Ticket To "Don Giovanni"
Description: An item Vera sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: An opera ticket sold by WGAA. The name of the opera and the showtime are printed on it. Despite WGAA's effort to update it for a modern audience, "Don Giovanni" still has a low turnout. The fact that this showing is taking place at 5:30 in the evening means there is barely any audience. Still, Vera will be waiting in that quiet, empty corner until the curtain falls.

Name: Camera
Description: An item Bianca sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Bianca bought this vintage camera in the shopping town. Although the technology nowadays allows people to capture clearer images with cameras of much smaller sizes, but one can still discover a completely different world when they peek through this unit's viewfinder.

Name: A Container That Won't Forget
Description: An item Bambinata sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The decoration on this small container was hand-crafted by Bambinata, inspired by the container that Vanessa customized for her. There is a brand-new notebook inside that she can write down the memorable moments. Bambinata once mentioned her "treasure box" that stored those things that were important to her at different times. Even if she has forgotten their origins when she sees them again, she never doubts their significance as long as they are in that box. Some memories last longer, while some are quickly forgotten. Bambinata gave you this container that she used to fight forgetfulness, in the hope that you can preserve as many important memories as possible.

Name: Masterpiece
Description: An item Ayla sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This is the last work displayed in the art exhibition of Babylonia's renowned rising artist, Ayla. Only a blank canvas sits inside the beautiful and delicate frame, with a bouquet of peonies that she sent along. To finish this painting requires both of you, as she has already thought of the content: her muse. Once completed, it will be her magnum opus.

Name: Yesterday's Catch
Description: An item Rosetta sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: You sailed to the sea with Rosetta in the whispers of the waves under the starry night. When the day-breaking sun touched the gunwale, the ship was already filled with the gifts from the sea. When did she become such a skillful fisher? You figured out the answer spontaneously seeing the local residents waving at her on the shore.

Name: The Fool
Description: An item Nanami sent along with her mail.
WorldDesc: The AI-drawn Tarot card blends the image of Nanami and that of "The Fool". On a quest to ensure her path leads to the whole "World", the young girl embarks on a long journey.

Name: Church Visit
Description: An item Haicma sent along with her mail.
WorldDesc: Plays the music video for "Church Visit". Featuring Haicma's synthesized voice, it introduces Church of Machina through a blend of rap, rock, folk, and pop music. Watching it leaves one in a trance for half an hour.

Name: Whispers Of Valley Pines
Description: An item Qu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Along with Qu's reply came an ancient scroll painting of Kowloong. Judging by the signature, this artwork is a millennium old. "In moss and dew, the dawn is bathed. Through veiled art, our souls are weighed. Upon the stones, pure waters rest. Through myriad valleys, pine winds wade." Anyone witnessing its beauty would surely be spellbound. It captures a moment in the Kowloong history, a serenity Qu will always aspire to but never quite reach.

Name: Beats & Beach Record: First Edition
Description: An item No. 21 sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The CD's cover alone transports you back to the heights of summer passion. Long-forgotten beats and melodies surge to life at its mere sight. Rumor has it that this first edition CD was made exclusively for Beats & Beach attendees, with very limited quantities released to the public. Clearly played numerous times, it seems No. 21 has relived cherished memories with this time and again. Wait... there's a subtle scratch on the back. Could it be... teeth marks?

Name: Commandant's Exclusive Space Helmet
Description: An item Karenina sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This space helmet was tailored by Karenina for Commandant's spacewalks. It features an integrated, highly customized AI system that will "gently" remind Commandant to follow the safety protocols using Karenina's voice.

Name: Chang's Breakfast Bundle
Description: An item Changyu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Made by Changyu himself, this Kowloong breakfast features many differently shaped food items in the steamer, but they all taste pretty good. In Changyu's memory, such steaming food often marks the beginning of a wonderful day. It is also his inner wish to sit with you and enjoy it like a family.

Name: Oasis
Description: An item Watanabe sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This tenacious and lively green color amidst the sands still has morning dew on it. Perhaps such color is not a rare sight in Babylonia, but to Watanabe, it is a precious symbol of the hope for the future. The sweetness within can only be tasted by those who have gone through considerable hardship.

Name: Stacking Dolls
Description: An item Roland sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: These dolls were crafted with reference to you-know-who, but the innermost figure is a young boy you have never seen. He does give you a familiar feel, which is probably an illusion. Remember that saying? "Life is like a bunch of dolls stacked together." Fake images are wrapped inside reality, but reality is concealed by more illusions. After peeling away all the layers, all that remains is emptiness and bitterness. Perhaps to the sender, their life is just like these dolls—so fragile and light that you can hold them in your hands.

Name: Dreamcatcher Chime
Description: An item Wanshi sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This delicate hand-crafted dreamcatcher is attached to several wind chimes that can make ethereal melodies. Apart from the slightly faded outside-facing side, this object appears to be well cherished. Originally a personal belonging of Wanshi, it now has Gray Raven Commandant listed as its owner. With his important one around, Wanshi no longer needs the dreamcatcher to bring him sweet dreams.

Name: Surprise Box
Description: Nanami's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: A bulged box with "Definitely no [Black Cardo] inside" written on it.

Name: Heart-Felt Gift
Description: Nanami's April Fool's Day Gift
WorldDesc: A mini sculpture that can fit in the palm. There is a line of text on its base. "Commandant, you are so persistent. Here's the real gift for you."

Name: S-Rank "Choice" Recruitment
Description: Gray Raven's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: A special order that can recruit a mysterious 5th member for the squad.

Name: External Hearing Device
Description: No. 21's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: An external hearing device made by No. 21 with reference to herself. The final product has some "minor" differences though.

Name: Retouched Photo
Description: Roland's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: A group photo that is "absolutely genuine" and "not edited at all."

Name: Lending a Hand
Description: Noctis' April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: A bright red mechanical arm of just the right size.

Name: Simple Stew
Description: An item Lucia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Prepared by Lucia herself, this home-cooked dish can finally be safely consumed, although the taste is rather bland as her past experiences have made her overly cautious with seasoning. It is a sign that she is gradually beginning to "live" her life, as it is no longer solely occupied by cruel battles. The days of wandering without supplies are gone. She has learned how to appreciate the details of everyday life with her important ones.

Name: Ancient Talisman
Description: An item Alpha sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Alpha stumbled upon this talisman in an ancient temple during her journey. When she found it, every other object nearby had already decayed with time, except this one that lay intact among the dry leaves. Wandering travelers never needed this talisman to pray for safety, but when Alpha saw it, the first thing that came to her mind was a human who was just as tenacious. She hopes you can safely arrive at the end and stand before her once again, regardless of whether you will end up as comrades or enemies.

Name: L-33
Description: An item Lee sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The newest iteration of the commandant life support machine, "L-33", updated with voice data personally recorded by Lee. Amidst Gray Raven's relentless combat missions, this unassuming little robot undergoes continuous technical enhancements, with each update regarded as a testament to its "growth." Primarily, it mirrors the seriousness and reliability of its creator, but occasionally, harmless bugs emerge, resulting in moments where it may circle around you, silently gazing up. In those instances, it seems to imply that visiting the maker directly for a fix would be the optimal solution.

Name: Lovers' Hairpin I
Description: An item Hanying sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A Kowloong accessory that has seemingly been split into halves. On the note that came with it is a gracefully handwritten poem: At the ferry of peach leaves, we part with a shared hairpin's grace. Haze veils the weeping willows, as we bid farewell, hearts embrace. Climbing the stairs, trepidation takes hold of me, witnessing the tempest's might, petals set free. None to hush the orioles' mournful serenade, their song endures as sorrows cascade.

Name: Homemade Cake
Description: An item Chrome sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A small piece of cake placed in an exquisite plate. Its appearance resembles a precious work of art, yet the enticing aroma of cream and fruit emanating from it betrays its true purpose as a delectable treat.

Name: Sunflower Tired of Time
Description: An item Noan sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A handcrafted sunflower that holds cherished memories between two people. Breaking free from its frame, it raises its head proudly, reaching for the time it awaits. May... some of the waiting can transcend its mere state and become something more than just a wait.

Name: Commandant's Health Report
Description: An item Liv sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A health check-up report provided by the Star of Life, accompanied by Liv's handwritten notes on its back about medical advice, precautions, recommendations for regulating daily habits, and dietary suggestions... This monthly report is routinely sent to the commandant, and Liv always provides thoughtful advice and reminders. It just so happens that it was sent today this month. Despite its regularity, Liv takes each one with utmost seriousness, regardless of time, her own well-being, or distance.

Name: Kung Fu Bible
Description: An item Pulao sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A secret codex of formidable martial arts, reputed to guide practitioners to the pinnacle of martial arts. On its first page, a proclamation looms boldly: To wield this technique, one must attain a grip strength of 200kg. It turns out that there are no shortcuts on the path to martial arts mastery...

Name: Ballade No. 1 in G minor, Op. 23
Description: An item Selena sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This is not her work, but emotions travel through her hands to that moment in your memory—"This is my favorite piece of yours." "I'm glad you like it. This is also my favorite piece."

Name: Screw, Gear and Gem
Description: An item Sophia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Discarded screws, gears, and iron fragments form this metal box, while a vivid orange gem rests at its center. The components originated from Asslam, while the gemstone was gifted by Jamilah. From a merchant's perspective, the box and the precious gem may seem incongruous. However, to Sophia, it holds cherished memories from her time with the Maintenance Crew, while the gemstone symbolizes the choices she has made since becoming a Construct, both carrying profound significance and equal value. Unsure if this gift holds immeasurable worth, Sophia willingly presents all she possesses to you, carrying indescribable emotions within her heart.

Name: Sunblaze Cape
Description: An item Kamui sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A warrior's attire isn't complete without a magnificent cape, just as they must wield a greatsword. Crafted by Kamui, this cape draws inspiration from Golden Age RPG game warriors. Despite the arduous process, it stands as a proud and heartfelt creation. The sun emblem, meticulously designed by Kamui, symbolizes light, heat, warmth, and guidance. It carries his heart and passion for the fortunate gift recipient.

Name: Snack Cart
Description: An item Camu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Bringing convenience right to the office desk, this cart is brimming with delectable snacks. Perfectly suited for those moments of hunger during intense work sessions, it can be effortlessly wheeled over alongside the gift giver.

Name: Luminant Shell
Description: An item Luna sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Emerging from the vast blue sea, this pristine white shell bears golden speckles, resembling brushstrokes traced by eternal light. It radiates a distinctive glow when bathed in sunlight. When softly blown into its horn-shaped opening, a melodious, frothy sound seems to whisper. As a natural creation, it carries the ocean's memories and the essence of life itself.

Name: Gift RoboPup
Description: An item Vera sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This exclusive edition of the Military-Grade Bionic Dog retains its original functionality while showcasing a newly designed appearance. Produced in a small quantity, it holds a distinct status. The thin red ribbon, once temporarily adorning her favorite "gift," has now been restored to its rightful place.

Name: Fragrant Snow
Description: An item Bianca sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The perfume and aroma stones have been carefully picked to emit a rare scent. Drop a few drops of essential oil on them to gradually spread the fragrance throughout the entire room, giving you a good night's sleep. Perhaps the sender's thoughts can also be conveyed to you in your dreams.

Name: Kitty Massager
Description: An item Bambinata sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The soft paw on this kitty is designed to remove the fatigue from those who have worked a long day. Along with this gift, the sender has also included a full set of replacement massager heads, featuring five different cat paw shapes that can tackle all types of muscle soreness. Its power level also seems to have been adjusted. Previously, a user accidentally set it on maximum and soon showed up at the emergency department of Star of Life.

Name: "May the Stars Shine Upon You Tonight"
Description: An item Ayla sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Hand-crafted by Ayla, this paper-cut lamp balances both functionality and aesthetics. It can be used as a decorative piece, as well as light up the room. When its power is turned on, starry light will flow through the Milky Way, bringing you back to that night when the two of you gazed at the stars together.

Name: Snow Pendant
Description: An item Rosetta sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A piece of jewelry made of a special stone, crafted by an amateur artist. The craftsmanship is rough around the edges, but the translucent surface glistens like ice. Every detail seemingly reveals a hidden feeling.

Name: Calendar "Earth"
Description: An item Nanami sent along with her mail.
WorldDesc: A three-dimensional tear-off calendar. Tearing off each page of the calendar will reveal a tiny globe as if each day brings one closer to Earth—the pure, beautiful, and safe home.

Name: Addiction-Proof Green Terminal
Description: An item Haicma sent along with her mail.
WorldDesc: A popular item on an online shop. Its portability and style are hopelessly outdated, but its key feature still makes it a big hit among parents—meanwhile, underage users often complain about it in customer reviews.

Name: Flowing Landscape
Description: An item Qu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A medium-sized moving sand art piece that is commonly found in Kowloong. Watching the sand slowly dripping down through the glass cover can grant one peace of mind.

Name: Grooming Brush
Description: An item No. 21 sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A true example of "low maintenance"—the silicone brush provides gentle massages, the ergonomic design fits like a glove, and the sealed chamber protects the pet owner from splashes. This is the best product for grooming your pet!

Name: Mermaid's Tear
Description: An item Lamia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Lamia heard mermaids' tears could grant immortality to those they hold dear, so she snuck into a human camp and spent an entire afternoon chopping onions.

Name: Escaped Star
Description: An item Karenina sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Karenina found this meteorite during an extravehicular activity. According to the calculations, it might come from a rapidly rotating star.

Name: Multifunctional Can Opener
Description: An item Bridget sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A multifunctional can opener with a heavily worn grip. Despite its age, the cutting blade shows no signs of rust. Faint engravings are still visible among the scratches: "Life is vast enough to accommodate solace for more than one."

Name: Star-Shaped Jar
Description: An item Echo sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Echo bought this jar with her savings. How long will it take to fill the jar if she folds one lucky star and puts it in every day?

Name: Infinite Mug
Description: An item Noctis sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: These custom-made mugs are only awarded to those who have made outstanding contributions to New Oakley, allowing their owners to enjoy unlimited refills at local bars. Noctis put a "hand" made sticker on one of the mugs to distinguish it from the other. *A friendly reminder from Star of Life: Enjoy responsibly.

Name: Longevity Noodles
Description: An item Changyu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Also called "Peace Noodles", they are a symbol of peace and success. Changyu is always obsessed with the freshness of food ingredients—now he finally has a chance to showcase his skills.

Name: "Star of Oasis"
Description: An item Watanabe sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Over millions of years, luminous substances deep within the earth have come together to form this natural glowing stone. The creator has meticulously crafted and polished the stone and attached it to a string, hoping it can light up your path during every dark night.

Name: Automatic Steel Palms
Description: Hanying's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: A pair of disproportional robotic arms with suspicious protruding structures in the palms.

Name: Special Pillow
Description: Strike Hawk's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: Made from steel, this spiked pillow can help those suffering from insomnia quickly fall asleep through physical means.

Name: "Special Deployment Ball"
Description: Gray Raven's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: Anytime, anyplace, Gray Raven at your service.

Name: Jester
Description: An item Roland sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A delicate, exquisite mask that represents "a sad clown". It's widely believed that the clown's smile is not out of true happiness, but who knows if the clown is really happy or sad behind the mask with the teardrop?

Name: Caffeine Concentrate
Description: An item Wanshi sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Babylonia's best-selling caffeine concentrate that comes in two versions: one for humans, and the other for Constructs. It is the best helper for one to have when working overnight to meet deadlines.

Name: Froggie and the Four-leaf Clover
Description: An item Lucia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This extremely rare book is the first one in the Froggie series, and it's about Froggie's search for the four-leaf clover that brings happiness.

Name: Immeasurable God of Thunder
Description: An item Alpha sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A God of Thunder whose powers cannot be contained. An extremely precious potted plant that was once considered a national treasure.

Name: "Moment and Eternity"
Description: An item Lee sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A standard bullet, worn by time and rusted. Its tail is wrapped in obsidian—guarding a precious thought.

Name: Lacquerware Tableware Set
Description: An item Hanying sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A modest yet refined tableware set neatly packed in a handmade wooden box. It includes a porcelain bowl, dish, lacquered chopsticks, bamboo spoon, and chopstick rest—the perfect tools for savoring Kowloong's rich tastes. As you savor your meal, do you ever wonder what the person with the other bowl is tasting?

Name: Gentleman Cane Umbrella
Description: An item Chrome sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Chrome's prized cane umbrella, crafted with precision and care that mirrors his meticulous nature. He gifts it to you, hoping you'll remember him every time you hold it.

Name: A Key With Hidden Dark Powers?
Description: An item Noan sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Noan's key that bears a strange name and can unlock the stronghold's hidden basement. Leave your burdens behind and head over to the safe haven for the night.

Name: Love
Description: An item Liv sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A pure white bird soars over Constellia, leaving behind a gentle trail. The Commandant left this bookmark on the desk—a symbol of love in its purest form.

Name: Handwoven Bamboo Bell
Description: An item Pulao sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Intricately woven and hides emotions between its strands. Wear it as an accessory or hang it as a decoration.

Name: "Whale Song" Decoder
Description: An item Selena sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: "It's a language only we understand," she says quietly, her voice carried by the distant sky and ocean currents.

Name: Sand Bottle Art
Description: An item Sophia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Sophia has collected colorful sand and hand-painted beautiful desert scenes in bottles. She's been focusing on improving her skills lately, hoping to soon incorporate her inner vision into her artwork.

Name: Funny Chips
Description: An item Camu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The potato chips are shaped like funny faces. You can pop several in your mouth at once. Trying to look fierce just makes you look... cuter!

Name: Basketball Nightlight
Description: An item Kamui sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A desk basketball converted into a nightlight. Trying to shoot hoops with your finger when it's late at night and no one's around isn't a bad way to pass the time.

Name: Glass of Moonlight
Description: An item Luna sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A moon-themed eco-terrarium made by Luna. "Raise a glass of moonlight, and drink to my thoughts of you." When you can't see each other, let this stand in for your presence.

Name: Battle Whistles
Description: An item Vera sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A pair of whistles handcrafted by Vera, one of which is a special gift for the Gray Raven Commandant. The unique craftsmanship ensures it won't easily break or deform in any environment, and it produces a stable, distinctive sound, guaranteeing that the two can quickly locate each other on any battlefield, no matter how harsh.

Name: Brownie Plus
Description: An item Teddy sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: The upgraded Brownie now has improved safety features and new search functions. Looking forward to seeing them in action!

Name: Horseshoe Necklace
Description: An item Bianca sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A horseshoe-shaped necklace designed by a renowned jeweler during the Golden Age. Serving also as a talisman, it has become an extremely rare piece of jewelry even among collectors.

Name: Crystal Music Ball
Description: An item Bambinata sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A handcrafted crystal ball with a wind-up key on the back. Once wound up, the carousel will come to life with a tranquil melody. Simple as it is, it carries the unforgettable memories between you and Bambinata.

Name: Leaf Craft
Description: An item Ayla sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A leaf artwork crafted by Ayla, depicting a group of lovely animals celebrating their friend's birthday, just as her friends celebrated hers. Now, she wishes to share this joy with you.

Name: Steak Knife
Description: An item Lilith sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Lilith's exclusive steak knife. The handle is made from rare wood, and the blade is made from high-carbon steel. It can cut steaks of any doneness like butter.

Name: Hunter's Handbow
Description: An item Rosetta sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A handbow handmade by Rosetta. She used suitable materials, so it weighs and feels perfect, carrying all her childhood memories of hunting with her grandpa.

Name: Nanami Telescope
Description: An item Nanami sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A Nanami brand telescope with Nanami's favorite stickers. It's said that observing stars with Nanami will trigger an interaction with her and then see some miraculous celestial phenomena.

Name: Proof: The So-Called Soul
Description: An item Haicma sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A book from the Golden Age. Due to its profound content, the book's sales and circulation were both low. Haicma found it on the floor. It uses philosophy to explore the possibility of AI producing souls, or, in other words, if machines are capable of thinking.

Name: World
Description: An item Ishmael sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Ishmael will sometimes record interesting things she observed in this mysterious way... Have a guess. Is it a model or the real 'world?'

Name: Kite
Description: An item Qu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Legend has it that the blue kite will always bring good luck. This mysterious and elegant bird has been a symbol of fortune and blessing since ancient times. Qu made this kite with the inspiration of the legend to express her best wishes.

Name: "Furry Buddy"
Description: An item No. 21 sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A hair ball toy No. 21 made with hair that fell from her balancing device. "'Furry buddy' smells like me. Remember this smell, and you will be able to find me no matter where I go in the future."

Name: Teru Teru Bozu
Description: An item Yata sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A hand-made Teru Teru Bozu by Yata. It might look a bit rough, but it might work miracles if you pray sincerely to it for a sunny day tomorrow.

Name: Clay Figurine
Description: An item Lamia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A trinket from the siren's secret room. It's said that whoever owns this little finger puppet can manipulate that person's soul to their satisfaction.

Name: Whispers of Space
Description: An item Karenina sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A Type IV cassette tape made and sent to the space station in the Golden Age with multiple rock songs. The originally blank Side B of it was recorded with new melodies by the girl who found it. The drifting verses have become the longing for the universe once again through her voice.

Name: Inverse Scale Inhibitor Dispersant
Description: Vera's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: Rumor has it this so-called elixir can save a dying person. Its rarity makes it a top-secret of Babylonia... those are but stories Vera made up on the spot. In truth, it is a bitter-tasting but fast-acting energy booster she personally concocted.

Name: Boom-Boom Penguin
Description: Bianca's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: There is a penguin doll that, upon seeing a human, loudly shouts "I want some huggies" and rushes over—only to explode the moment it makes contact. After agonizing over it for days, Bianca eventually wrote this as an April Fool's joke.

Name: Super Lucky Cleaning Solution
Description: Discord's April Fool's Day Mail Attachment
WorldDesc: Co-developed with Discord from Scarab, this limited-edition April Fool's product is a cleaner that can supposedly eliminate any stubborn stain. Discord firmly denies having anything to do with the marketing slogans on the label—she blames it all on Shiva.

Name: Home-use Power Drill Set
Description: An item Bridget sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A must-have on Bridget's maintenance bench, this drill set has solved countless little home mishaps. The moment your hand grips the handle, you will feel an irresistible urge to drill something.

Name: Fondant Cookie
Description: An item Echo sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A fondant cookie handmade by Echo, with the fondant shaped like Echo herself. Although the craftsmanship is not top-tier, you can still feel its maker's sincerity.

Name: Super Exciting Invitation
Description: An item Noctis sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A fiery gesture paired with a letter exuding freedom and excitement—who can resist this passionate invite?

Name: Buddha's Palm
Description: An item Changyu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: This best-selling Kowloong martial arts comic once set a record of 18 reprints in one year. Chang Yu enthusiastically recommended it to Commandant and repeatedly insisted that he absolutely does not idolize the heroic main character.

Name: Kalimba
Description: An item Watanabe sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Unknown

Name: Invitation to a Magic Show
Description: An item Roland sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Unknown

Name: Nest
Description: An item Wanshi sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Unknown

Name: Froggie Dessert
Description: An item Lucia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A dessert handcrafted by Lucia, featuring the cheerful Froggie theme and a healthy recipe from the Star of Life—definitely worth a try. Makes you want to create more simple yet genuine sweetness with her in the future.

Name: Zen Garden
Description: An item Alpha sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A zen garden constructed in virtual reality. If you look closely, you will find a set of coordinates from the arrangement of sand and stones—she is waiting for you.

Name: Seltz Limone e Sale
Description: An item Lee sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Lee carefully studies the recipe of this summer drink: 200ml of salted seltzer water, 500ml of ice, 3 slices of lemon, and another 500ml of ice—this isn't very healthy right now. Lower the sugar to 20ml... or even less. 19.55ml... Is it too sour now?

Name: "Mountains during Dusk after Rain"
Description: An item Hanying sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A Kowloong-style landscape painting hand-painted by Hanying. Depicted between the poems are the dusk-dyed mountains after rain, as blue haze floats around the fragmented clouds. A dry brush painted the old, thriving pine tree on a hill, upon which sits a small pavilion where a river streaming from between two mounts pauses. Inside the pavilion, Hanying and the commandant are enjoying the view together. "Twilight rouges the songs, and the hills stroke the sights."

Name: Flameless Scented Diffuser
Description: An item Chrome sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Chrome's personal item in his home. The fresh and elegant scent has been found on his clothes countless times before.

Name: Solar Wind Turbine
Description: An item Noan sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Found in a thrift shop, this is a unique turbine that runs on solar power. If wind cannot bring freedom, the light will enlighten.

Name: "Nutrients"
Description: An item Liv sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: Refreshing drinks made by Liv. Not only do all of them smell fruity and fresh, but they also have Liv's best wishes and heartfelt thoughts handwritten on the bottles.

Name: Lotus Candle
Description: An item Pulao sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A traditional Kowloong birthday gift that, when lit, spins on the table while playing traditional birthday melodies. Make sure you destroy its internal mechanism before use, or you'll keep hearing music from some corner of your room.

Name: Candy Terminal
Description: An item Jetavie sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: They say being too busy and stressed can lead to "Ghost Syndrome." To help cure you, Jetavie created this mini computer out of candy. Connect it to your own terminal to tap into Jetavie's computing power and receive mission support. The candy keys also provide sugar supplements, though the sweetness might be a bit unpredictable...

Name: Iris Letter
Description: An item Selena sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A short note written by Selena herself, the royal-blue ink forming graceful script that can't hold all her thoughts. The page may be short, but her feelings run deep. The words left unsaid are best spoken face-to-face.

Name: Spice Brooch
Description: An item Sophia sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A brooch handmade by Sophia using her collection of spices. Agarwood flowers bloom on cinnamon branches, their rich scent carrying a promise that will never fade.

Name: Dental Care Set
Description: An item Camu sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A custom-made, mascot-themed dental kit. Make sure to brush thoroughly—your puppy toothbrush is watching!

Name: "Sunset and Shadow"
Description: An item Kamui sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A crystal ornament custom-made for Kamui by the fortune-telling house, said to hold mystical power. "It records your past and reveals your future. Look into it, and you'll see your beloved and yourself."

Name: "Moon Rabbit"
Description: An item Luna sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A rabbit-shaped tap light sent by Luna. No one knows what powers it—tap it once and it stays glowing. Maybe it's a little too cute, but that's fine.

Name: Interesting Fruit Basket
Description: An item Vera sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A basket of test apples from the Science Council, entrusted to the Gray Raven Commandant for distribution. Be careful with the carved ornament that looks like apple peel—it's a quirky little gift.

Name: Little Bear Tea Set
Description: An item TeDDy sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: An extremely rare collectible from the once-popular "Teddy" tea set line, produced only through pre-orders. Christina spent a long time tracking down a brand-new complete set and finally won it for a high price at auction.

Name: Pterosaur Model Kit
Description: An item Veronica sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: With so many parts, assembling it took a lot of time and effort, but the finished model looks impressive and makes a striking room decoration.

Name: "Home"
Description: An item Bianca sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A miniature house carefully built by Bianca. The wooden cottage is well-crafted, with elegant silver-white lily petals, quietly carrying a distant and gentle dream of home.

Name: Little Ravey
Description: An item Discord sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: "In the Name of Gray Raven"—a handmade doll stitched with care. Every line and seam shows thoughtful craftsmanship. The clothes can be changed freely, and every detail carries the warmth of the maker's touch. May this small gift carry the feelings behind it and pass them on.

Name: "Memories of Our Dance"
Description: An item Bambinata sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A projector shaped like a swan, holding the data from the day Bambinata and the Commandant danced together. Though her dance steps weren't perfectly smooth, each movement was done with full dedication.

Name: Film Transparency
Description: An item Ayla sent along with the Activation Date mail.
WorldDesc: A single frame of film taken by Ayla using a vintage exposure technique. Place it in a slide projector to relive that afternoon you spent together, anytime.

Name: Lilith - 1224
Description: Lilith - 1224
WorldDesc: Lilith - 1224
